Post.title: [4]alda
Post._content:
alda

<!-- more -->

aldaA music programming language for musicians.

[web-demo](http://alda-lang.github.io/web-demo/)

### 
[](https://github.com/alda-lang/alda#installation)alda.
alda
```
alda up
```

### 

```
alda play --code "piano: c6 d12 e6 g12~4"
```

`piano: c6 d12 e6 g12~4`alda
`piano``c``6`

#### 
alda[](https://github.com/alda-lang/alda/blob/master/doc/list-of-instruments.md)

#### 
`c c# d d# e f f# g g# a a# b`
alda`c c+ d d+ e f f+ g g+ a a+ b`c`c-`
Octave
```
piano: o3 c d e g
```

`>``<`
```
piano: o4 c d e g > c d e g < c d e g
```

#### 
alda
* c41/4cc81/8c`c2 d e`cde1/2
* g12~41/121/4g

```
piano: c6 d12 e6 g12~4
```

#### 
r
```
piano: c6 d12 e6 g12~4 r4 c6 d12 e6 a12~4
```

#### 
/
```
piano: c/e/g c/e/g c/e/a c/e/a
```

#### 
```
piano:
  c6 d12 e6 g12~4 r4 c6 d12 e6 a12~4

guitar:
  c/e/g6 r3 r2 c/e/g6
```

#### 
`test.alda`
```
(tempo! 90)
(quant! 95)

piano:
  o5 g- > g- g-/f > e- d-4. < b-8 d-2 | c-4 e- d- d- <b-1/>g-

flute:
  r2 g-4 a- b-2. > d-32~ e-16.~8 < b-2 a- g-1
```

```
alda play --file test.alda
```

### Alda REPL
alda`alda repl`

Post.title: Superset
Post._content:
superset
[superset](https://github.com/airbnb/superset)

<!-- more -->

virtualenv
------------

virtualenv, ${superset_env}
```bash
virtualenv ${superset_env}
```
, [requirements.txt](#requirements.txt)
```bash
cd ${superset_env}
pip install -r requirements.txt
. bin/activate
```


cd : ${superset_source}
```bash
cd ${superset_source}
cd superset/static/assets
npm install
npm run prod
cd ${superset_source}
export PYTHONPATH=.:${PYTHONPATH}
```



------------
```bash
cd ${superset_source}
superset/bin/superset runserver -p 12306
```

terminal
------------

```bash
cd ${superset_source}
. ${superset_env}/bin/activate
export PYTHONPATH=.:${PYTHONPATH}
superset/bin/superset runserver -p 12306
```


requirements.txt

Post.title: react-nativeappium
Post._content:
react-nativeappiume2e

<!-- more -->

### AppiumWebDriver
[Appium](http://appium.io/)App
[WebDriver](https://www.w3.org/TR/webdriver/)[Selenium](http://www.seleniumhq.org/)web

### ReactNative
Appium **uiautomator** react-nativeAndroid`accessibilityLabel`.
Component
```jsx
<TouchableNativeFeedback
    background={TouchableNativeFeedback.Ripple("red", true)}
    accessibilityLabel="clickZone"
    onPress={counter}
>
    <View style={DynamicStyle.AccessibilityLabel.clickZone}>
        <Text>Some Text</Text>
    </View>
</TouchableNativeFeedback>
```
`TouchableNativeFeedback``accessibilityLabel="clickZone"`.

+ Appium
AppiumView
```python
desired_caps = {
    'platformName': 'Android',
    'deviceName': 'Meizu MX5',
    'appPackage': 'com.androidcode',
    'appActivity': '.MainActivity',
}
driver = webdriver.Remote('http://localhost:4723/wd/hub', desired_caps)

sleep(5)
try:
    ## accessibilityLabel
    el = driver.find_element_by_accessibility_id('clickZone')
    assert el
    ## 3
    map(lambda x: el.click(), range(0, 3))

    ## Text
    els = driver.find_elements_by_android_uiautomator('new UiSelector().textContains("Some")')
    assert els
    logging.warning(els[0].text)
except Exception, e:
    logging.error(e, exc_info=True)

driver.quit()
```

desired_caps = {

    assert els
    logging.warning(els[0].text)
except Exception, e:
    logging.error(e, exc_info=True)

driver.quit()

### 
Python
```python
def cache_result(f_key=lambda x: x, expired=0):
    """
    @param f_key: cache_key
    @param expired: cache
    @return: cache
    """
    def dec(func):
        cache_v = {}
        cache_t = {}

        def new_func(*args, **kwargs):
            key = f_key(*args, **kwargs)
            if key not in cache_t or expired and time.time() - cache_t[key] >= expired:
                cache_v[key] = func(*args, **kwargs)
                cache_t[key] = time.time()
            return cache_v[key]
        return new_func
    return dec
```
`f_key`keyid(`x => x`)
`expired`
`new_func`key`func`

### 
redis(redis)(5)
```python
@cache_result(lambda self, user_id, locale: RedisDataHelper.get_data_key(user_id, locale), 5)
def get_data(self, user_id, locale):
    ret = self.redis_db.get(RedisDataHelper.get_data_key(user_id, locale))
    return ret
```
5RedisDataHelper.get_data_keykey5

### 
Python3.2`functools``lru_cache`[](https://docs.python.org/3.6/library/functools.html#functools.lru_cache)
key
fibonacci
```
@lru_cache(maxsize=None)
def fib(n):
    if n < 2:
        return n
    return fib(n-1) + fib(n-2)
```
[](https://github.com/python/cpython/blob/3.6/Lib/functools.py)`lru_cache`lru
